name: Ghosting Vandal
description:
Take on the challenge, let's have some fun!
Ghosting Vandal is not trying to reinvent the wheel, it's trying to bring you a good ol' fun challenge to put your skills to the test.

Play in the role of Mozz, a skilled Ghosting mercenary of the Neon Arlenis Heroic Guild, and take on the dangerous Ghosting Warrior Captains across action packed stages in a linear, Arcade-like style.
Unravel the mystery of the Half-Elf Swordsman who seems to be on your trail, are you really the hero of the story?

Master your gun, master your blade, balance your gameplay!

***IMPORTANT: THIS GAME IS ON EARLY ACCESS***
Some features have not been implemented like control and key mapping or language settings.
Get an early start on the gameplay and characters, master your weapons!
